title: "'It's fundamental': Graphcore CEO believes new kinds of AI will prove the worth of a new kind of computer"
excerpt: "Graphcore, the four-year-old startup based in Bristol, England, has a chip that takes the kinds of math that a neural network processes and splits them across 1,216 tiny computers, each of which does its work in parallel with its brethren."
